Day of Defeat is the last skill-based FPS game made. Per-pixel accuracy, anticipation, map awareness, reflexes, it had it all without being a complete twitch fest like Quake. The added "realistic" nuances of modern FPS such as larger maps, larger player matches, movement penalties, class/archetype dependencies have only taken away from the pure competitive FPS experience. Unfortunately, this style of FPS is an end of an era, encapsulated in its time. Games that try to fuse this with modern elements such as the latest Counter Strike releases feel dated. The last attempt to revive this title (Source) also tried fusing modern elements to gameplay but compromised what made DOD unique and great in the first place.

Day of Defeat, Day of Defeat . . . C'est le genre de jeux auxquels je joue sans savoir pourquoi. Est-ce que c'est réellement un bon jeu ? Bof. C'est un FPS en équipe quoi. Un système de points à prendre, et tout ce que cela implique. Est-ce que ça mérite vraiment sa place au sein d'une bibliothèque fournie ? Oui, quand même. Je recommande, mais à ceux qui savent ce qui les attend dans cet univers simpliste.

03年开始玩的，这是一款，永远改变了我对于FPS认知的游戏，让我失去对CS热爱的游戏，让我爱上夺旗类FPS的游戏，让我爱上战地的游戏，让我根本不会去玩CF的游戏，让我变成近视的游戏，让我贡献了至少500小时的游戏，虽然我不再会向朋友们推荐这款游戏，但是它永远在我的记忆中有那么独特的一个位置。

下面是一点重温感受
时隔九年，通过Valve complete pack，又一次重温了这个游戏，发现自己已经是一个NOOB了，曾经KD可以轻松到达2-3以上，压枪基本都能瞄到人头，98K可以轻松秒杀对手的我，现在只能勉强维持0.5的KD，压枪时发现准星乱跑，什么枪都用不好了，真是老了。
Muuuuito bom, me surpreendi!

At first I was sceptical of day of defeat, but then I started the story. It instantly sucks you in with deep characters, varied dialoge options and real consiquences. Your thrust into a rich retro WWII world torn by war, with nothing but your standard arsenal of guns and bullets. The drab uniforms and faces of all the characters really gets you in the mood for defeat. And the voice actors are simpky stunning, xXSniper1337Xx's line "fuck you n00b cunt you scrub" as he dies to my landmine really pulls at the heart strings, and I stillhear his worlds echoing in my ear to this day. Definatley recomend for any fan of call of duty  or battlefield fan.
for a $1.25 this game is well worth it.

A true classic from the days when half a dozen guys in their basements could work together to produce the best game they could because they wanted to play the best.  The simple, predictable mechanics of the GoldSource engine give you a level of fine control over movement that greatly contributes to the depth of the gameplay.  It's not without some bugginess and rough edges, all games of that era had that, but once you get past the dated graphics the gameplay stands up to any modern FPS out there.  I would argue it surpasses them.  Once you get passed the initial learning curve, you'll have some adrenaline-pumping moments, sneaking behind enemy lines, going on fast-paced rampages, chucking an enemy's grenade right back into his face.  The community is quite mature and friendly and has a relatively high proportion of female gamers.  There are still some very good servers going, and at the right time of day you can still play on a couple of full servers.  There are hundreds of custom maps, many of them every bit as good or better than the official maps. It's great to play a game knowing that you're helping the other people playing be able to enjoy themselves.

It's cheap, buy it, stick with it for a bit, and help keep this awesome community alive.

Bloody frusterating as all hell.
Why?
Walking through an ally way with team mates, at least four
Im at the front, theres a machine gun at the exit and I can't get out.
Suddenly, team mates all decide the best course of action is to throw 
their grenades out of the exit in an effortless hope to kill the gunner.
They all miss horribly. 
Allyway is filled with grenades, I turn around and start screaming
maniacally while the rest of the team says "GO FORWARD DUMBASS"
I sprint out of the allyway at mach speed, get gunned down, the rest
of the team gets blown out of the allyway by the force of a thousand 
suns into one big pile of clipping corpses in front of this mortified
machine gunner who just witnissed the first friendly fire induced
holocaust. The gunner siezes this fnck-up and takes advantage of our
major failure. He pushes up into the allyway where all of us, again, 
try to have another go at it. This time, im not first. someone else is.
The first guy sprints into the allyway and is gunned down. I decide to 
throw a grenade which promptly kills the machine gunner and I run 
into the ally. My ass-backwards sorry sh!t-for-brain team mates 
don't read the bloody kill feed and throw grenades at me, thinking 
the machine gunner is still there. I scream "GUYS WHAT THE HELL,
IT'S CLEAR, DON'T THROW GRENADES" but apparently all they heard
was "IT'S CLEAR", because they all came sprinting into the allyway
practically slipping on their own grenades like mario kart banana peels,
and the grenades vaporize our asses clean off.

Игра классная, сразу говорю!
В ней есть несколько недостатков, но почти все они не имеют значения.
Самый главный недостаток в этой игре, по моему мнению - это отсутствие оптического прицела, кстати, эту проблему пофиксили в версии Source.
А теперь, немного о самой игре:
Игра была сделала по мотивам второй мировой войны, здесь как в контр страйке, есть 2 стороны, которые противостаят друг другу, армия Вермахта и армия США, но на некоторых картах есть армия Англии. В игре есть много оружия той эпохи, конечно, за каждую сторону разное.
Про огромное изабилие карт я говорить не буду.
В общем, всем советую, я сам играю с большим удовольствием.

Оценка: 8,5 из 10.
(Много снизил из за опт. прицела)
